You infuse the land with primal energy, healing it.

Level: 15
Category: Exploration
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: Instantaneous
Component Cost: 3000 gp
Market Price: 8000 gp
Key Skill: Nature

You transform an area of defiled terrain into normal terrain. The size of the area you transform is determined by the result of your Nature check.

Nature Check ResultArea Transformed
14 or lowerClose burst 1
15–22Close burst 2
23–30Close burst 5
31 or higherClose burst 10
